It acts much like the FIFO only it is two way. Currently it supports viewing/changing status, viewing the user list, viewing groups, sending messages/urls, and dumping the network log.

This plugin opens a TCP server on the Licq box which allows you to telnet in and perform commands and get information. It works with the new licqweb web interface. Package.Name: licq-autoreply

Plugin to automatically respond to any incoming event with the output of a given program, which can be passed user arguments, or event the message text itself. Often used in conjunction with "fortune" to send people fortunes.

Package.Name: licq-web
Package.Description: licqweb is a Web frontend for licq. It interfaces with the Remote Management Service plugin and uses AJAX to provide real-time communication. It is useful for people who use IMs from multiple locations and want a 'centralised' application that means no more logging off and on, consolidates chat history to the one location, and prevents problems where messages are missed because another IM client received them.

licqweb is a Web frontend for licq. It interfaces with the Remote Management Service plugin and uses AJAX to provide real-time communication. It is useful for people who use IMs from multiple locations and want a 'centralised' application that means no more logging off and on, consolidates chat history to the one location, and prevents problems where messages are missed because another IM client received them.

gerbv, Gerber dosyalarını görüntülemek için bir araçtır. Gerber dosyaları baskili devre levhasi (PCB) tasarımlarını üreticilere iletmede kullanılır.

Source.Name: gtkwave
Source.Summary: A wave viewer for LXT, LXT2, VZT, GHW and standard Verilog VCD/EVCD files
LXT, LXT2, VZT, GHW ve VCD/EVCD dosyaları için dalga görüntüleyici
Source.Description: GTKWave is a fully featured GTK+ based wave viewer for Unix and Win32 which reads LXT, LXT2, VZT, and GHW files as well as standard Verilog VCD/EVCD files and allows their viewing.

Source.Name: speedcrunch
Source.Summary: SpeedCrunch is a fast, high precision and powerful desktop calculator.

Source.Name: veusz
Source.Summary: Veusz is a scientific plotting package written in Python.
Source.Description: Veusz provides a GUI, command line and scripting interface (based on Python) to its plotting facilities. The plots are built using an object-based system to provide a consistent interface.

Update.Comment: Version bump and depend to new numpy
Update.Name: Murat Şenel

Source.Name: gretl
Source.Summary: A cross-platform software package for econometric analysis

Source.Name: units
Source.Summary: A simple program for units conversion
Birimleri birbirine çeviren basit bir program

Source.Name: qlandkarte
Source.Description: View and upload map files, track and waypoint data to your Garmin GPS.

Source.Name: josm
Source.Description: JOSM is a feature-rich offline editor for the experienced OSM mapper. It supports stand alone GPX tracks, GPX track data from the OSM database and existing nodes, line segments and metadata tags from the OSM database.

JOSM, deneyimli OSM haritacılarına yönelik zengin özelliklere sahip bir çevirim-dışı düzenleyicisidir. Bağımsız GPX izlerinin yanı sıra; OSM veritabanından GPX izlerini, mevcut düğümlerini, hat parçalarını ve etiketlerini kullanabilir.

Source.Name: navilink
Source.Summary: NaviGPS Data Transfer via Serial USB
NaviGPS Seri USB Portundan Veri Aktarımı
Source.Description: This is a simple perl script that implements the NaviLink protocol to communicate with a Locosys NaviGPS via serial USB.
Navilink protokolüyle bir Locosys NaviGPS ile seri USB portundan bağlantı kurarak veri aktarımı yapan basit bir perl betiğidir.

Source.Name: rkhunter
Source.Description: A security tool that scans for rootkits, backdoors and possible local exploits. It does this by comparing MD5 hashes of important files with known good ones in online database, searching for default directories (of rootkits), wrong permissions, hidden files, suspicious strings in kernel modules, and special tests for Linux and FreeBSD.

Source.Name: fpm2
Source.Summary: GTK2 port of Figaro's Password Manager
Source.Description: FPM2 is a GTK2 port of Figaro's Password Manager originally developed by John Conneely, with some new features.
Parolalarınızı güvenli şekilde saklamanızı ve kolay kullanımını sağlayan, Figaro'nun Parola Yöneticisi'nin GTK2 versiyonu.
